alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Gogebic; Houghton; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 7:44AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Gogebic, southern Houghton, Ontonagon and northwestern Baraga Counties through 815 AM EDT/715 AM CDT/... At 743 AM EDT/643 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles northeast of Ontonagon to 6 miles southwest of Marenisco. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baraga, Ontonagon, Marenisco, Watersmeet, Bergland, Rockland, Bruce Crossing, Paulding, Keweenaw Bay, The Lower Entrance of Portage Canal, Kenton, Mass City, Northern Lake Gogebic, Nisula, Greenland, Norwich, Trout Creek, Presque Isle Reservoir, Pomeroy Lake and Donken. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Baraga; Gogebic; Houghton; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton
